content:
IActorServicePartitionClient Interface

Definition

Defines the interface for the client that communicate with an actor within a service partition.

In this Article

public interface IActorServicePartitionClient : Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Communication.Client.IServicePartitionClient<Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Remoting.Client.IServiceRemotingClient>, Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Remoting.Client.IServiceRemotingPartitionClient

Properties

ActorId

Gets the id of the actor this client communicates with.
